imdb.plot outline: Red Bull Flugtag: On the Wings of Glory is a 5-part television event that follows six Red Bull Flugtag teams from across the U.S. as they create, build and pilot homemade flying machines at one of the four events in summer 2010 (Miami, Twin Cities, Long Beach and Philadelphia). Viewers will witness the behind-the-scenes drama, successes, mistakes and hilarity that happens along the way as these six brave teams spread their wings in search of human-powered flight. In each of the episodes, the host, Bert Kreischer, will guide viewers through each of the team's build process, and in turn, becomes inspired to take on human-powered flight himself. Bert will launch his own flying machine at Red Bull Flugtag Philadelphia on September 4th, 2010.
imdb.title: Red Bull Flugtag: On the Wings of Glory

plot: _Red Bull Flugtag: On the Wings of Glory_ (qv) is a 5-part television event that follows six Red Bull Flugtag teams from across the U.S. as they create, build and pilot homemade flying machines at one of the four events in summer 2010 (Miami, Twin Cities, Long Beach and Philadelphia). Viewers will witness the behind-the-scenes drama, successes, mistakes and hilarity that happens along the way as these six brave teams spread their wings in search of human-powered flight. In each of the episodes, the host, Bert Kreischer, will guide viewers through each of the team's build process, and in turn, becomes inspired to take on human-powered flight himself. Bert will launch his own flying machine at Red Bull Flugtag Philadelphia on September 4th, 2010.::Anonymous
